title: Morty in power armor skin for amumu.
body:
{{champion:32}} 
There could be a skin for Amumu, based on Morty of from Rick and morty where they find a planet which has a purge to keep crime levels down, (obv from movie purge.) rick and morty get into suits of power armor, morty goes insane and purges everyone, it'd be a nice skin for amumu, but if anyone has a better champion this skin could go on please leave a reply below.

replies.body: I dont think they can co-opt rick and morty since DOTA2 already has a deal going with them. Though theyd just do it along the lines of 'frozen shen' and 'grungy nunu' I guess :p
